text: 179 is a number. It comes after 178 and before 180. == In mathematics == * 179 is an odd number. * It is a prime number, which means it has only two factors: 1 and 179. * It is the 41st prime number. * The digits of 179 add up to 17 (1 + 7 + 9 = 17). == Fun fact == * 179 is a Chen prime, which means 179 + 2 (which is 181) is also a prime number. * 179 is a Sophie Germain prime, because 2 Ã— 179 + 1 = 359 is also a prime.
title: 179 (number)
